snippet: Created by Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman, the Conviction Review Bureau would be the first statewide law enforcement initiative to fight wrongful convictions in New York.
abstract: New York State Attorney Gen Eric T Schneiderman announces creation of the Conviction Review Bureau to investigate criminal cases across the state in which convictions have been called into question; bureau is the first statewide initiative by a law enforcement agency to address potential wrongful convictions, at a time when many in the state's criminal justice system are calling for changes, like videotaping of police interrogations.
lead_paragraph: Created by Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman, the Conviction Review Bureau would be the first statewide law enforcement initiative to fight wrongful convictions in New York.

headline.seo: N.Y.S. Bureau to Investigate Questionable Convictions
headline.main: New State Office to Review Questionable Convictions
headline.print_headline: New State Office to Review Questionable Convictions
